featureFlags.title: The Available Feature Flags
featureFlags.newDemoApplicationLayout: Enables the new modern layout for the demo application
featureFlags.experimentalFeatures: Enables experimental features across the application
featureFlags.taskBoardView: Enables Kanban board view for tasks
featureFlags.taskCategories: Enables categorization and filtering of tasks
featureFlags.taskReminders: Enables notification reminders for task deadlines
featureFlags.taskCollaboration: Enables task sharing and collaboration features
featureFlags.taskAnalytics: Enables task completion analytics and reporting
